channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://areaven.yzi.me/forum/images/awardforums/afh.png[/img]
[URL=http://areaven.yzi.me/playnow.html]Play Now[/URL] | [URL=http://https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/45449662/Areaven.jar]Download[/URL] | [URL=http://http://areaven.yzi.me/forum/index.php]Forums[/URL] | [URL=http://http://areaven.yzi.me]Homepage[/URL] [/CENTER] Server Features
[ul][*]Flawless Combat system [*]8+ Bosses to do [*]Slow EXP rate [*]Voting store [*]3 Different donator icons [*]100% Working castle wars [*]100% Working Pest control [*]Working item effects + specials [*]Clue scrolls + Caskets [*]Full economy never too rich or too poor [*]Regular updates so you dont get bored [*]20 Working skills [*]Alot of more features come and check them out[/ul]
